title: Investigation of Special Sunny Sunday Pet Box
content: We are currently investigating the issues relating to the Special Sunny Sunday Pet Box from the Week 6 - August 27th, 2023 Sunny Sunday Event.

title: Community Livestream - v.244 Update Preview
content: Join Community Manager Ezrabell and a special guest in the next Community Livestream as they preview the upcoming events and contents in v.244 Punch King Palooza!

title: Scheduled Cash Shop Maintenance - August 24, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled cash shop maintenance on Thursday, August 24, 2023 at 5:00 AM PDT (8:00 AM EDT / 2:00 PM CEST / 10:00 PM AEST).

title: v.244 Punch King Palooza Update Preview
content: Take a step into Spieglemann's Secret Ring Shop and test your strength in the World’s Best Punch King event!

title: Cash Shop Update for August 23
content: Spirit Collector Packages, Mystery Mix Daily Deals, and more!

title: Important Changes to Buff Freezers
content: Learn about upcoming changes to MapleStory's death penalties and how they will affect Buff Freezers.

title: Miracle Summer - August 26 - Shoes
content: This Saturday, August 26, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Shoe Equipment!

title: Marvel Machine Returns!
content: The Marvel Machine is back through Sunday, August 27!

title: Cash Shop Update for August 16
content: Marvel Machine, Premium Surprise Style Box and more!

title: Wongstaurant's Final Orders
content: This is it, Wongstaurant's Final Orders! At the end, you'll have one final decision to make.

title: The Marvel Machine Returns August 18!
content: Get ready, because the Marvel Machine is returning on Friday, August 18 at 11:00 AM PDT!

title: Community Livestream - Gear Review w/ Danny!
content: Join Community Manager Ezrabell alongside Danny in a Community Livestream to review gear submitted by other Maplers!

title: Kaling and Shangri-La are Live
content: The Shangri-La area is available now and you can challenge the new boss Kaling.

title: [Completed] Scheduled Minor Patch - August 10, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 6 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: Cash Shop Update for August 9
content: Royal Styles, Choice Styles, and more!

title: Miracle Summer - August 12 - Accessories/Emblems/Hearts/Rings
content: This Saturday, August 12, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Face Accessories, Eye Accessories, Pendants, Shoulders, Rings, Earrings, Belts, Badges, Emblems, and Android Hearts!

title: Community Livestream - Sixth Star Showdown w/ Team Pink Bean!
content: Join Community Manager Ezrabell alongside Team Pink Bean from the Sixth Star Showdown event in a Community Livestream!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Maintenance - August 3, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 3 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: August 2023 Community Contests and Events
content: Take a look at the new and upcoming Community Contests below, and be prepared to test your imagination!

content: We will be performing a scheduled minor patch on Thursday, August 10, 2023 at 6:30 AM PDT (9:30 AM EDT / 3:30 PM CEST / 11:30 PM AEST).

content: We will be performing a scheduled minor patch on Thursday, August 10, 2023 at 6:30 AM PDT (9:30 AM EDT / 3:30 PM CEST / 11:30 PM AEST).
